SELECT 
	No_,
	[No_ 2],
	[Description],
	[Description 2],
	--replace(replace(replace([Description],',', ' '), '"', ' '), '''', ' ') as [Description],
	--replace(replace(replace([Description 2],',', ' '), '"', ' '), '''', ' ') as [Description 2],
	[Base Unit of Measure],
	[Item Category Code],
	[Product Group Code],
	[Selling Price],
	[Pack Size Information],
	[Pack Size],
	[2Way Item],
	[Short Name],
	[Pack Title],
	[Pack Group Code],
	[Jar Deposit],
	[Pcs Per Case],
	[Item Class],
	[FG Category],
	[Packaging Type],
	[Container Type],
	[Sub Brand],
	[SKU Category]
 FROM [BisleriNAV16Test].[dbo].[BIPL - MUMBAI$Item]
 where [Item Category Code] in ('FG', 'TRD-FG')
